data.title: List of Sport Names For Kids (With Pictures)
data.meta_description: Want to teach your little sports enthusiasts the name of different sports? Click here to view some activities that are easy and simple and will help your child learn sport games names.
data.text:
It’s said rightly said that a healthy body is closely related to a healthy mind. If we look at this closely, the subject of health involves sports. Therefore, we must teach our children about sports, its importance and the name of sports in English.

ADVERTISEMENTS

Sports activities & games help children develop all-pervasive skills that are needed to support them in a lifetime. There is a growing need for children to be involved in physical activities today to counter the effects of technology that has made a permanent spot in their lives with some disastrous consequences. Therefore, some sports games can maximise their potential and help them lead healthy lifestyle.

ADVERTISEMENTS

Let’s look at what sports is and its importance.

What Is A Sport And Why It Is Important?

A sport can be defined as a game or an activity that is competitive and athletic and requires some particular set of skills or physical abilities to be carried out. There are several kinds of sports today, like swimming, gymnastics, cricket, football and more.

ADVERTISEMENTS

It is important for children to learn about sports as knowing about sports helps children to know more about their surroundings and learn new vocabulary and expressions as they practice their favourite disciplines. Also, practising one or more sports is the perfect way for children to learn about sportsmanship, and it helps them to grasp the importance that teamwork has in a person’s life.

ADVERTISEMENTS

Here are some benefits of sports for kids:

It improves strength.

It improves self-esteem.

It improves critical thinking skills.

It improves self-discipline.

It increases awareness of right and wrong.

List Of Sport Names For Children

There are various sports that are enjoyed by people all around the world. Sport is a great way to relieve stress and maintain a healthy body. Practising a sport not just enhances your physical health, but you also enjoy and have a great time with your pals. Sports help to promote friendliness, teamwork, hard work, and discipline.

ADVERTISEMENTS

Let’s take a look at the name of different types of sports that can help your child to improve their vocabulary and build their confidence in both speaking and listening.

Cricket

Hockey

Tennis

Football

Volleyball

Swimming

Gymnastics

Table Tennis

Horse Riding

Boxing

Basket Ball

Badminton

Baseball

Archery

Golf

Karate

Rowing

Snowboarding

Running

Ice Skating

Rugby

Pool

Bowling

Skating

Cycling

Rock Climbing

Weight Lifting

Judo

Kick Boxing

Sky Diving

Bungee Jumping

Kayaking

Canoeing

Rafting

Snorkelling

Aerobics

Discus Throw

Kickboxing

You can also take print of sports name list with pictures and teach your child with its help.

Now, let us look at some of the names of sports games category-wise.

ADVERTISEMENTS

Adventure Sports Names

Adventure sports are the ones that are undertaken through the medium of land, air and water and are perceived as involving a high degree of risk.

1. Paragliding

ADVERTISEMENTS

2. Mountaineering

3. Rock Climbing

4. Trekking

5. Sky Diving

6. Bungee Jumping

Aquatic Sports Names

Aquatic sports are events that take place in water or involve water as a part of the game.

ADVERTISEMENTS

1. Swimming

2. Scuba Diving

3. Kayaking

4. Surfing

5. Sailing

6. Rowing

Strength And Agility Sports Name

Strength and agility sport is the ability to move and change direction and body position quickly in the game.

ADVERTISEMENTS

1. Aerobics

2. Archery

3. Body Building

4. Boxing

5. Cycling

6. Karate

Ball Sports Name

Ball sports are any form of a game which features a ball as part of the game.

1. Tennis

2. Base Ball

3. Bowling

4. Golf

5. Polo

6. Handball

Games That Will Teach Your Child About Sports

Now that you know the name of some sports with the help of the sports games name list, are you ready to teach these names to your little one? But how? Use the activities mentioned below to teach your child the names of some common sports easily.

1. Learn With Flash Cards

On some flashcards, paste the images of different sports. Now show these cards one by one to your child and ask them to guess the name of that sport.

2. Hop And Name

Here is the twist to the simple hopscotch game. All your child needs to do is say the name of any sport while hopping. Ask your little one to come up with a different name every time they hop.

3. Sport Atlas

In this game, your child has to say the name of any sport that starts with the last letter of the previous sport. For example, if you have said “Kayaking”, your child has to say a sport name that starts with “g”, like “Golf”.

In a nutshell, there are plenty of sports that children can enjoy. This list above consists of only some well-known sports for kids to read, providing the best growth and development opportunities. We hope you enjoyed reading this article!
